mapper.update: update visit_record set visit_start_time = #{visitStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visit_end_time = #{visitEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visit_content_type = #{visitContentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_content_id = #{visitContentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, visit_user_id = #{visitUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where visit_id = #{visitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select visit_id, visit_start_time, visit_end_time, visit_content_type, visit_content_id, visit_user_id from visit_record where visit_id = #{visitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select visit_id, visit_start_time, visit_end_time, visit_content_type, visit_content_id, visit_user_id from visit_record
